name: SnowReportforHeavenlyMountain
0:
”Alexa, ask Heavenly Mountain for the snow report”
”Alexa, open Heavenly Mountain”
”Alexa, ask Heavenly Mountain for latest conditions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: heavenly mountain
des: The Heavenly Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
